about_the_game:
"*In order to use the cards included in the DLC, purchase of the “Additional Card Pass"""" or “Additional Card Set Vol.3 [D-BT07]: Raging Flames Against Emerald Storm” will be required.
*It is not available to use or check cards included in this DLC unless you purchase “Additional Card Pass"""" or “Additional Card Set Vol.3 [D-BT07]: Raging Flames Against Emerald Storm”.
*Even if you purchasied this DLC first, included cards can be unlocked by purchasing “Additional Card Pass"""" or “Additional Card Set Vol.3 [D-BT07]: Raging Flames Against Emerald Storm”.

This set includes 1 copy of each card in FFR or FR treatment.
[INCLUDED]
・D-BT07/FFR001EN Flaring Cannon Equip, Baur Vairina
・D-BT07/FFR002EN Meteor Flare Dragon
・D-BT07/FFR003EN Stealth Beast, Silent Crow
・D-BT07/FFR004EN Heat Haze Acrobat, Miroslava
・D-BT07/FFR005EN Demonic Jewel Dragon, Drajeweled
・D-BT07/FFR006EN Demonic Stone Dragon, Rockargour
・D-BT07/FFR007EN Blitz CEO, Welstra
・D-BT07/FFR008EN Blitz Secretary, Perfe
・D-BT07/FFR009EN Blitz Engineer, Hoflio
・D-BT07/FFR010EN Unrivaled Heavenly Blade, Descorda
・D-BT07/FFR011EN Youthberk ""RevolForm: Tempest""
・D-BT07/FFR012EN Knight of Rendering Flash, Cairbre
・D-BT07/FFR013EN Benevolent Maiden, Araserith
・D-BT07/FFR014EN Resonance Dragon
・D-BT07/FFR015EN Sylvan Horned Beast, Alpin
・D-BT07/FR01EN Break Equip Dragon, Urbargo
・D-BT07/FR02EN Assault Bullet of Dust Storm, Oswald
・D-BT07/FR03EN Sealed Blaze Dragon, Samahdi
・D-BT07/FR04EN Lilac Lasher
・D-BT07/FR05EN Power Gem Dragon
・D-BT07/FR06EN Falcate Performer
・D-BT07/FR07EN Gravidia Allanhil
・D-BT07/FR08EN Blitz Mechanic, Iskra
・D-BT07/FR09EN Blitz Mechanic, Schtart
・D-BT07/FR10EN Heavenly Wings of Purity, Honnettaria
・D-BT07/FR11EN Wayward Therapy Angel
・D-BT07/FR12EN Witch of Accumulation, Sequana
・D-BT07/FR13EN Tear Knight, Aricks
・D-BT07/FR14EN Festoso Dragon
・D-BT07/FR15EN Sylvan Horned Beast, Seroll
・D-BT07/FR16EN Strike Cannon of Dust Storm, Andrea
・D-BT07/FR17EN Pierce Equip Dragon, Valsable
・D-BT07/FR18EN Lavamane Wyvern
・D-BT07/FR19EN Sorrow Severing Twin Blades
・D-BT07/FR20EN Attract Inverse
・D-BT07/FR21EN Reaper in the Shadows, Zeilmort
・D-BT07/FR22EN Demonic Jewel Dragon, Rystal Galer
・D-BT07/FR23EN Demonic Stone Dragon, Matelvaara
・D-BT07/FR24EN Gravidia Almanon
・D-BT07/FR25EN Blitz Accounting Department Head, Sordio
・D-BT07/FR26EN Overwatching Monster, Proteed
・D-BT07/FR27EN Mobile Fortress of Obliteration, Freischutz Maximum
・D-BT07/FR28EN Graceful Heavenly Flash, Hermona
・D-BT07/FR29EN Spinning Knight, Gwendolen
・D-BT07/FR30EN Divine Sister, Languedechat
・D-BT07/FR31EN Divine Sister, Palmier
・D-BT07/FR32EN Sylvan Horned Beast, Tigralta
・D-BT07/FR33EN Archaeology Scholar, Ante Ealter
・D-BT07/FR34EN Rousing Breath Dragon
・D-BT07/FR35EN Sympathize dB

*If you already own the maximum number of cards allowed in-game that are also included in this set, you will receive the equivalent amount of CP (in-game material for card crafting) instead."
detailed_description:
"*In order to use the cards included in the DLC, purchase of the “Additional Card Pass"""" or “Additional Card Set Vol.3 [D-BT07]: Raging Flames Against Emerald Storm” will be required.
*It is not available to use or check cards included in this DLC unless you purchase “Additional Card Pass"""" or “Additional Card Set Vol.3 [D-BT07]: Raging Flames Against Emerald Storm”.
*Even if you purchasied this DLC first, included cards can be unlocked by purchasing “Additional Card Pass"""" or “Additional Card Set Vol.3 [D-BT07]: Raging Flames Against Emerald Storm”.

This set includes 1 copy of each card in FFR or FR treatment.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows8.1
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows8.1
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-3770
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
